descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Message a Model
options.description: Send a message to Ollama model

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

inputType.name: inputType
inputType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.hint: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to be processed
binaryPropertyName.description: Name of the binary field(s) which contains the image(s), separate multiple field names with commas
binaryPropertyName.ai_hint: Name of the binary field(s) which contains the image(s), separate multiple field names with commas

imageUrls.name: imageUrls
imageUrls.description: URL(s) of the image(s) to analyze, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma
imageUrls.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

simplify.name: simplify
simplify.description: Whether to simplify the response or not

options.name: options
system
options.placeholder: e.g. You are a helpful assistant.
options.description: System message to set the context for the conversation

options.name: temperature
options.description: Controls randomness in responses. Lower values make output more focused.

options.name: top_p
options.description: The maximum cumulative probability of tokens to consider when sampling

options.name: top_k
options.description: Controls diversity by limiting the number of top tokens to consider

options.name: num_predict
options.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate in the completion

options.name: frequency_penalty
options.description: Adjusts the penalty for tokens that have already appeared in the generated text. Higher values discourage repetition.

options.name: presence_penalty
options.description: Adjusts the penalty for tokens based on their presence in the generated text so far. Positive values penalize tokens that have already appeared, encouraging diversity.

options.name: repeat_penalty
options.description: Sets how strongly to penalize repetitions. A higher value (e.g., 1.5) will penalize repetitions more strongly, while a lower value (e.g., 0.9) will be more lenient.

options.name: num_ctx
options.description: Sets the size of the context window used to generate the next token

options.name: repeat_last_n
options.description: Sets how far back for the model to look back to prevent repetition. (0 = disabled, -1 = num_ctx).

options.name: min_p
options.description: Alternative to the top_p, and aims to ensure a balance of quality and variety. The parameter p represents the minimum probability for a token to be considered, relative to the probability of the most likely token.

options.name: seed
options.description: Sets the random number seed to use for generation. Setting this to a specific number will make the model generate the same text for the same prompt.

options.name: stop
options.description: Sets the stop sequences to use. When this pattern is encountered the LLM will stop generating text and return. Separate multiple patterns with commas

options.name: keep_alive
options.description: Specifies the duration to keep the loaded model in memory after use. Format: 1h30m (1 hour 30 minutes).

options.name: low_vram
options.description: Whether to activate low VRAM mode, which reduces memory usage at the cost of slower generation speed. Useful for GPUs with limited memory.

options.name: main_gpu
options.description: Specifies the ID of the GPU to use for the main computation. Only change this if you have multiple GPUs.

options.name: num_batch
options.description: Sets the batch size for prompt processing. Larger batch sizes may improve generation speed but increase memory usage.

options.name: num_gpu
options.description: Specifies the number of GPUs to use for parallel processing. Set to -1 for auto-detection.

options.name: num_thread
options.description: Specifies the number of CPU threads to use for processing. Set to 0 for auto-detection.

options.name: penalize_newline
options.description: Whether the model will be less likely to generate newline characters, encouraging longer continuous sequences of text

options.name: use_mlock
options.description: Whether to lock the model in memory to prevent swapping. This can improve performance but requires sufficient available memory.

options.name: use_mmap
options.description: Whether to use memory mapping for loading the model. This can reduce memory usage but may impact performance.

options.name: vocab_only
options.description: Whether to only load the model vocabulary without the weights. Useful for quickly testing tokenization.

options.name: format
options.description: Specifies the format of the API response

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

messages.name: messages

values.name: content
values.description: The content of the message to be sent
values.placeholder: e.g. Hello, how can you help me?

values.name: role
values.description: The role of this message in the conversation

options.name: User
options.description: Message from the user

options.name: Assistant
options.description: Response from the assistant (for conversation history)

messages.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'modelId'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'inputType'
IF inputType == 'binary' AND operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF inputType == 'url' AND operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'imageUrls'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'simplify'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'message' AND resource == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'modelId'
IF operation == 'message' AND resource == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'messages'
IF operation == 'message' AND resource == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'simplify'
IF operation == 'message' AND resource == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
